name: 阿梅代奥·阿莫迪奥
name_full: 阿梅代奥·阿莫迪奥 Amedeo Amodio
introduction: Amedeo Amodio is an Italian choreographer and former ballet dancer. Trained at the Teatro alla Scala where he performed notably with Carla Fracci, he founded the modern ballet academy Aterballetto in 1979. He served as the artistic director there until 1996, and most recently in 2003 accepted a position as artistic director at Teatro Massimo in Palermo, Sicily.
